name: farming de-simulator 1989
description:
this is a demake of farming simulator nintendo nes version playable only in full screen of resolution 1920 x 1200

a bug appears after loading a game if you leave your part without detaching your tools from the vehicles, the cutter bar is attached to the tractor and can no longer be used, in this case save again and reload

all graphics, code, design and sound by me

possibility to switch between a azerty and qwerty keyboard

at the top left is a pop-up screen to indicate which keys have been used

you can buy seeds, plant and harvest wheat and oats to then store it in a silo to sell it to the highest bidder.

the prices offered are displayed with the tab key and fluctuate over time

you start the game with $ 10,000. a save is available for those who would like to play for a long time
